Package br.com.concepting.framework.resources

Class PropertiesResourcesLoader

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.resources.BaseResourcesLoader<PropertiesResources>
br.com.concepting.framework.resources.PropertiesResourcesLoader
public class PropertiesResourcesLoader extends BaseResourcesLoader<PropertiesResources>
Class that defines the basic implementation to manipulate resources as properties.
Since:

      Constructor - Manipulates specific resources.

      language - Instance that contains the language of the resources.
      Throws:
      InvalidResourcesException - Occurs when the default resources could not be read.
